1517720.name: RPG Maker MV - Eberouge Event Picture Pack 2
1517720.description:
From creator Five Happiness comes Eberouge Event Picture Pack 2 offering even more inspired event-based backgrounds for your latest RPG. Eberouge Event Picture Pack 2 continues where Pack 1 left off, featuring a new array of background art where characters are engaging in activities such as basketball, acting, bug hunting, camping, running and more.

The Eberouge Event Picture Pack 2 is perfect for those looking for unique background images for their characters. Select between an already created background or simply use the character only cut-outs and place them in your own special backgrounds. What exciting events do you have planned for your next great RPG?

FEATURES:

* files in PNG format
* Total of 37 graphics for event background (26 of these are 1000 x 740 pixel)
* Files come with variations of characters with and without background
* Compatible with RPG Maker MV, MZ and Visual Novel Maker
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engines of your choice, however, please note that the sales of a game using this content is NOT allowed where the buyer is a corporation or any multi-person entity.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* Not OK for use in games with gore
* Not OK for use in adult-rated games
1517720.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
